title: Home explodes in Maine, injuring one
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News A home in Oakland, Maine, was leveled in a Thanksgiving Day explosion, officials said.
Crews responded Thursday after a house exploded in Oakland, Maine.
Office of Maine State Fire Marshal A house exploded in Maine on Thanksgiving, injuring one person and spreading debris throughout a residential neighborhood.

title: Derrick White breaks out of shooting slump and other takeaways from Celtics win over Pistons
